name: Downtime (na-es)
description:
With the ability to slow down everything around you, you will experience a completely different type of gameplay experience from your typical First-person shooter.

Witness intense gameplay despite harnessing what people may consider an "overpowered" ability. Shoot and platform your way through 9 different levels!

Language(s): English 日本語

Follow me on twitter: @na_3su
